title: Man uses sleep recorder app and picks up more sounds than he bargained for

If you use a sleep recorder app , you’re probably used to the software picking up snoring , sleep talking, and the odd grunt.

But one man discovered more sounds than he bargained for, after he downloaded a sleep recorder app.

Fin Costick tweeted a hilarious screen recording of his app, which picked up several recordings of him farting through the night.

His tweet has garnered more than 222,000 likes at 60,000 retweets, with many users finding the recording hilarious.

(Image: Getty)

One user replied: “I was expecting something scary like footsteps but came the farts and I can’t stop laughing.”

Another wrote: “I have bronchitis and I think I’m going to die, I’m laughing so hard.”

And one joked: “This is the only tweet in a while that has actually made me laugh out loud and not just blow out of my nose slightly harder.”

However, many other users sympathised with Mr Costick’s wind issues.

One user replied: “I’m so glad somebody else understands man,” while another added: “This is why I’m too afraid to download it lol ignorance is bliss.”
